PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02482022-03-06,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add ten (10) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; and (2) remove the duplicate listing of three (3) individuals from Schedule 1 of the Regulations. These measures prohibit these individuals from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freeze their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0048 Publication Date: 2022-03-16
